word_mean: 胚胎发育：卵生动物卵的胚胎发育过程
保温育婴：为婴儿，特别是早产儿的发育，建立的一个温度、湿度和氧气都适宜的环境
潜伏期：某一传染病从病原体进入机体后到出现症状前的一段过程，另见period项下，参见decubation
孵育，孵化：将微生物或其他细胞置于受到控制的环境条件下，特别是温度适宜的培养基中，使之最适宜生长
温育：使反应混合物保持一定的温度和时间以促进化学的或酶的反应

sentence.Network_en: Male albatrosses share in the incubation of eggs.
The four stages of creative thought are preparation, incubation, illumination, and verification.
sentence.Network_cn: 创造性思考的四个阶段是准备 、 沉思 、 启迪 、 求证.

sentence.Network_en: The illness has an incubation period of up to 11 days.
sentence.Network_cn: 该病有长达11天的潜伏期。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... incubate v 孵卵，伏巢 incubation n 孵卵；潜伏期 incubator n 孵卵器；早产儿育儿箱.
农作物种子检验规程水分测定GB/T 3543.6-1995 ... 3.2 种子健康状况 seed health 3.3 培养 incubation 3.5 丸化种子 seed pellets.
incubated egg 孵化蛋incubation 培育incubation for autumn rearing 秋蚕孵化

list.abs: 2006年5月26日 -  人工孵化(artificial incubation) 在人工控制的条件下,使受精卵进行发育并达到孵化的技术。在海水养殖方面,孵化工作经常应用这一技术培育出许多食用动物.
incubation for autumn rearing 秋蚕孵化incubation period 孵化期incubative infection 暗藏性传染
infantile 婴儿的，幼儿的infant incubator 婴儿保温箱infant monitor 婴儿监护仪
...企业的自我约束机制 self-regulating mechanism of enterprises企业孵化器 enterprise incubator企业改制 restructuring of enterprise

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: from Latin incubatio(n-) 'brooding', from the verb incubare (see incubate)

entry.def: When birds incubate their eggs, they keep the eggs warm until the baby birds come out.

example.ex: The birds returned to their nests and continued to incubate the eggs.
example.tran: 鸟儿回到巢里继续孵卵。

entry.def: When a germ in your body incubates or is incubated, it develops for a period of time before it starts making you feel ill.

example.ex: The virus can incubate for up to ten days after the initial infection.
example.tran: 病毒在初次感染以后可以潜伏长达 10 天。

entry.def: If you say that plans or ideas incubate, you mean that they develop slowly after a lot of thought or discussion.

example.ex: ...the fateful decision which had doubtless been incubating in his mind for years.
example.tran: 无疑已在他头脑中酝酿了多年的重大决定

means.word_mean: 1. maintaining something at the most favorable temperature for its development
2. (pathology) the phase in the development of an infection between the time a pathogen enters the body and the time the first symptoms appear
3. sitting on eggs so as to hatch them by the warmth of the body

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. =lie down,表示"躺"; 2. =barrier,表示躺的"东西,障碍"

stems_affixes.word_buile: con一起+cub躺+ine女人→一起躺着的女人→情妇
cub躺+icle小东西,小地方→躺的小地方
incubate[v.孵化;使发展]+ion状态,过程→n.孵卵期,潜伏期

stems_affixes.value_cn: 孵卵器,早产婴儿保育箱
stems_affixes.word_buile: incubate[v.孵化;使发展]+or物器→n.孵卵器,早产婴儿保育箱
in进入+cub躺+us→[人入睡时]躺在人身体上[或里面]的东西
in向内+cub躺+ate表动词→躺在里面→孵卵
